text: We have used the iLIR web resource (https://ilir.warwick.ac.uk) to identify LIRCPs in viruses (see Methods for details). 27, 28 Out of 16,609 reviewed viral sequences available from UniProt across 2569 individual viral species we found that 15,589 of them contain either xLIR or WxxL motifs. 6376 proteins Figure 1 . Screenshot of the iLIR@Viral database 'Classification' menu. Example for the ICTV classification system. The genera for which no LIRCPs were found appear in red.
